articles.author: Bernama
articles.title: Embassy confirms warning issued to Japanese nationals in Malaysia over possible terror threat - New Straits Times
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: The Japanese embassy in Kuala Lumpur has confirmed that a warning has been issued to Japanese citizens in Malaysia over a possible terrorist threat in Southeast Asia.
